item.title: Database Triggers
item.description: Database trigger is an event that can occur after or before a statement is executed or a row is modified / inserted / deleted. This can be used to perform any task before or after certain occurrence of an event in the database. I was curious about this concept from a very long time and wanted to check it out. I wanted to try an automation by creating a trigger function.
